####Ejercicio 3


```{r,echo =TRUE}

```

1.

```{r,echo=TRUE}
filter(happy,!is.na(happy)) %>% group_by(sex,happy,year) %>% summarise(cont=n()) %>%arrange(year) %>% group_by(year) %>% mutate(porcent=(cont/sum(cont)*100))
```
